github_body:
Map changes:
* #263 Map comment fixed width is removed; the comment now always scales to the width of the text.

MDT importer changes:
* #266 MDT importer works again; fixed various errors and updated to the latest version of Mythic Dungeon Tools.
discord_body:
v2.9 (2020/04/17)(https://keystone.guru/release/v2.9)
Map changes:
    * #263 Map comment fixed width is removed; the comment now always scales to the width of the text.

MDT importer changes:
    * #266 MDT importer works again; fixed various errors and updated to the latest version of Mythic Dungeon Tools.
reddit_body:
[https://keystone.guru/release/v2.9](https://keystone.guru/release/v2.9)

Map changes:
* [\#263](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/263) Map comment fixed width is removed; the comment now always scales to the width of the text.

MDT importer changes:
* [\#266](https://github.com/Wotuu/keystone.guru/issues/266) MDT importer works again; fixed various errors and updated to the latest version of Mythic Dungeon Tools.

changes.change: Map comment fixed width is removed; the comment now always scales to the width of the text.
MDT importer works again; fixed various errors and updated to the latest version of Mythic Dungeon Tools.
